content:
>There is a way out
>The door, /exit/
>Key is missing
>Remember to use it on ~/exit 
//Tux

In the chest, you find a shovel and a piece of paper:
>I buried the key in a HOLE in these RUINS!
>Cannot be found! Don't try!
You pick up the shovel.
*The SHOVEL can be USED with "mkdir"*
To leave the hole, use [cd ..] or [cd ~] to return home.

Congratulations!
You have unlocked the exit!
Please proceed to the next level.
